messages.message:
Moved my feedback to this doc to avoid blowing up the channel and keep the notes in one place...
https://docs.google.com/document/d/1EsFHi4cQF1_9g9X-VxmHg_Pw30IP9nFP6lGen6J3m8A/edit#

@Hari @Varun Jain i'm curious what is different about the model and prompts running behind the scenes?

It's almost always giving worse results than ai-labs for the same prompt in every case

We are working through trying different model configurations and indexing techniques for queries on large docs, and balance that with performance for small docs. Definitely a lot of work to be done in the model development area :)
Right. given that we know how many pages are in the input doc, can we use different back-end configurations for longer vs shorter docs?

First we want to optimise performance for ‘docs up to a certain size’. e.g. user should be confident that at least all docs up to 50 pages are working well. This is not the case right now. Post that we can optimise the model selection (and cost associated) with it.
